short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to easily save images from Google Docs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a simple way to download images from Google Docs? Our Chrome extension lets you quickly and easily save any image directly from a Google Doc to your device with just a few clicks. Say goodbye to workarounds and time-consuming methods! Whether you're a student, designer, or professional, this tool simplifies your workflow.

Why Install?

Effortless Image Saving: Save images from Google Docs in their original quality instantly.
Time-Saving: No need to copy-paste or take screenshotsâ€”get images directly with one click.
Convenience: Perfect for professionals, students, researchers, and anyone needing fast access to embedded images.
Streamline your work with our easy-to-use image-saving solution!
